original_text: When God's people are in a time of trouble, they will receive a little help. Many people will join them who are not their true friends.
korean_text: 그들이 몰락할 때에 도움을 조금 얻을 것이나 많은 사람들이 속임수로 그들과 결합할 것이며

sentences.original_text: When God's people are in a time of trouble
they will receive a little help
who are not their true friends
